page.title: 11Daily Life - An Engineer
page.content: Many working people travel away from Edingale to work.This example is of a man who goes to Birmingham(21 miles).He gets up at 7.30-8.0. He has no breakfast but drinks a cup of coffee.It takes three-quarters of an hour to get to work. When he gets to work he visits everyone checking that they are O.K. If there are any jobs to quote he does them in the morning. Then he sees customers, goes to the welders, but not on Thursdays, when he goes to the bank for the wages.He also checks the drawings and makes sure that the men are always busy. It is essential that he checks that all the parts are there and nothing is missing. He orders from a German company called HASCO and then he again makes sure the men are working.INTERUPTION! A rush job comes in.
